trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bowling Green
There were no other sightings in Bowling Green on or around December 8th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1. I was standing in the field at just past 2:30am taking my dog sparky for a potty break. 2. It was big. 3. I thought it was a aircraft. 4. Hovered. 5. I felt scared and I still do. I now feel like I may be under observation because I now know too much. 6. Faded away.
